description:
Get ready to hit the road and discover hidden places and new vehicles. Drive safe though, since a new damage system shows visual damage on your truck and other vehicles at the point of impact. With three hidden places, you can search for unknown roads and unlock new trophies. You can also spot five brand-new vehicles in traffic, including a tow truck and minibus. So drive responsibly and go exploring!

Features:
-Get visual 3D damage with dents and scratches on your truck and other vehicles
-Find three hidden places that are off the map and unlock new trophies
-Spot five new vehicles: a minibus, classic muscle car, tow truck, box truck and pick-up truck
-Discover your clientsâ€™ new look with revamped character art
name: Truck Driver - Hidden Places & Damage System DLC
